id.description: The id of the character record.

charId.description: The external wanderer's guide character id.

userId.description: The discord id of the user who imported the character

calculatedStats.description: The computed base stat block from the Wanderer's guide API

isActiveCharacter.description: whether this is the active character for the user's character based commands

createdAt.description: When the character was first imported

lastUpdatedAt.description: When the character was last updated
